nodes.text: While working undercover as a salvager at the Colossus, the pirate Synara San owned a specialized salvaging skiff. She used the craft to go on salvaging missions in the waters around the Colossus. Prior to the Bibo incident, San took Resistance pilot and spy Kazuda Xiono on a ride aboard her skiff to question him. However, they were interrupted by the appearance of Bibo's mother, a giant rokkna sea monster. The two managed to flee aboard the skiff back to the Colossus and raise the alarm.
